channel.title: Alternate Revenues
channel.description:
I am looking for a alternate way to make money for a VPS.
I was wondering what other ad sites, besides Google has ad services? I can't find any good ones.

item.title: Alternate Revenues
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:11, topic:434668”][quote author=Beebee.Dodson link=topic=537386.msg3929371#msg3929371 date=1330542876]

Get a job.

I have one, but don’t have a debit card.
[/quote]get a bank account, if not open one. Or go get a pre-paid card and put it on paypal.[/quote]

quite google found this: http://www.netchunks.com/5-best-alternatives-to-adsense/ but idk if any of those are good. their is linkbucks and adf.ly

  1. make a yt account
  2. get a partnership
  3. make videos add as many relevant tags as possible
  4. apply monetization to your videos
  5. make them video responses to popular videos
  6. wait
  7. profit

i’ve made like $7 over the past 4 months on just one video. idk not much but if i was making youtube videos regularly and got a regular audience i would probably be doing ok. plus the video i am using its amazing its even getting as many views as it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Alternate Revenues
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Beebee.Dodson, post:3, topic:434668”][quote author=tinyscape link=topic=537386.msg3929369#msg3929369 date=1330542785]
Get a job.
[/quote]

I have one, but don’t have a debit card.[/quote]get a bank account, if not open one. Or go get a pre-paid card and put it on paypal.

Read full topic

item.title: Alternate Revenues
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Walmart cards only work in the country you buy them in, like if you buy one in the U.S.A you can only buy things that are in the U.S.A same apples to online it must be in the same country.

Read full topic

item.title: Alternate Revenues
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

try to find some new hosting companies, get a paypal, and talk to the owner to try to get a support job. You will get like .50 cents of the package price or something normally.

Read full topic

item.title: Alternate Revenues
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Beebee.Dodson, post:7, topic:434668”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=537386.msg3929392#msg3929392 date=1330544161]

Get a job.

I have one, but don’t have a debit card.

If you have a job just go to wallmart and buy a pre-paid visa.

I tried, but it said some shit like, “Sorry, but this card cannot be used online.”

The website you were using probably didn’t support that specific card.
Pay by mail is usually an option.
[/quote]

Hmm, do you know of any ad services, besides Google?[/quote]
Nope, I generally don’t have the patience for them but I heard there was an app on the iPod/phone/pad that allows you to do surveys on them and it pays a bit faster then most, I don’t remember it’s actual name though.

Read full topic

I tried, but it said some shit like, “Sorry, but this card cannot be used online.”
[/quote]
The website you were using probably didn’t support that specific card.
Pay by mail is usually an option.[/quote]

Hmm, do you know of any ad services, besides Google?
